verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> this <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>spoke<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Let the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> where I was <S%H3205>born<s%>, and the <S%H3915>night<s%> in which it was <S%H559>said<s%>, There is a man <S%H1397>child<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>.
Let that <S%H3117>day<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; let not <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1875>regard<s%> it from <S%H4605>above<s%>, neither let the <S%H5105>light<s%> shine upon <S%H3313>it<s%>.

Let <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%> <S%H1350>stain<s%> <S%H6053>it<s%>; let a cloud <S%H7931>live<s%> upon <S%H3650>it<s%>; let the blackness of the <S%H3117>day<s%> terrify <S%H1204>it<s%>.

As for that <S%H3915>night<s%>, let <S%H652>darkness<s%> <S%H3947>seize<s%> upon <S%H2302>it<s%>; let it not be joined unto the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, let it not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3391>months<s%>.
<S%H3915>Behold<s%>, let that night be <S%H1565>solitary<s%>, let no joyful <S%H7445>voice<s%> come in <S%H935>it<s%>.
Let them <S%H5344>curse<s%> it that <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%>, who are <S%H6264>ready<s%> to raise <S%H5782>up<s%> their <S%H3882>mourning<s%>.

Let the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H5399>twilight<s%> there be <S%H2821>dark<s%>; let it <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%>, but have <S%H7200>none<s%>; neither let it see the <S%H6079>dawning<s%> of the <S%H7837>day<s%>:
Because it shut not <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my <S%H990>mother<s%>'s womb, nor <S%H5641>hid<s%> <S%H5999>sorrow<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
Why <S%H4191>died<s%> I not from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>? why did I not give up the <S%H1478>spirit<s%> when I came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H990>belly<s%>?
Why did the <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H6923>prevent<s%> <S%H7699>me<s%>? or why the breasts that I should <S%H3243>suck<s%>?
For now should I have lain <S%H7901>still<s%> and been <S%H8252>quiet<s%>, I should have <S%H3462>slept<s%>: then had I been at <S%H5117>rest<s%>,
With <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H3289>counselors<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, which <S%H1129>built<s%> desolate places for <S%H2723>themselves<s%>;
Or with <S%H8269>princes<s%> that had <S%H2091>gold<s%>, who <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%>:
Or as an <S%H2934>hidden<s%> untimely <S%H5309>birth<s%> I had not <S%H5768>been<s%>; as infants which never <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>.
There the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> from <S%H7267>troubling<s%>; and there the <S%H3019>weary<s%> be at <S%H5117>rest<s%>.
There the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> <S%H7599>rest<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; they <S%H8085>hear<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5065>oppressor<s%>.
The <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> are <S%H5650>there<s%>; and the servant is <S%H2670>free<s%> from his <S%H113>master<s%>.
Therefore is <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to him that is in <S%H6001>misery<s%>, and <S%H2416>life<s%> unto the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> in <S%H5315>soul<s%>;
Which <S%H2442>long<s%> for <S%H4194>death<s%>, but it comes <S%H2658>not<s%>; and dig for it more than for hid <S%H4301>treasures<s%>;
Which <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> <S%H1524>exceedingly<s%>, and are <S%H7797>glad<s%>, when they can <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6913>grave<s%>?
Why is light given to a <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H5641>hid<s%>, and whom <S%H433>God<s%> has hedged <S%H5526>in<s%>?
For my <S%H585>sighing<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> I <S%H3899>eat<s%>, and my <S%H7581>roarings<s%> are poured <S%H5413>out<s%> like the <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
For the thing which I <S%H6343>greatly<s%> <S%H6342>feared<s%> is <S%H857>come<s%> upon <S%H3025>me<s%>, and that which I was afraid of is come unto <S%H935>me<s%>.
I was not in <S%H7951>safety<s%>, neither had I <S%H8252>rest<s%>, neither was I <S%H5117>quiet<s%>; yet <S%H7267>trouble<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>.
